channel.title: The Zero-Source Server Project
channel.description:
I am currently working on a new project that has taken me a while to even think about starting. i am going to need alot of people to work on this with me. What exactly am i doing? I am making a [b]gigantic[/b] power server, i am trying to make it capable of holding over 1,000 players without crashing. i am going to start off of the Project Fallout Source.
What i need help in is all of these current things
[ul][li] Server hosting [/li] [li] Webclient creating[/li] [li] Server creation (i can't do this alone you know) [/li] [li] Software - i need some hackers to get me stuff off of torrents (i cant use bittorrent ect...)[/li] [li] Modeling gurus (i have some model/animation ideas :p [/li][li] [list][li] Interface/animation gurus[/li] [/list]
What you can expect [list] [li] One of the largest servers ever hosted [/li] [li] whoever created moparscape gets full rights to the server (since im going to be supporting moparscape)[/li] [li] ^^ So does silabsoft ^^[/li] [li] All players will have choices for a pvp server (99 all), or a normal server (start from scratch) this means We will need more than two servers to bee hosted[/li] [li] NO DONATIONS WILL EVER BE NEEDED FOR MEMBERSHIPS - everything on the server will be free[/li] [/list]
Those are only a few of all the details i am going to put into this server, if anyone wants to help just join zerocomfor.com/forums thank you for your time and if any mods think this isn't good for the forums please contact me and lock if you must.
I will be updating this soon.[/ul]
